Options:
A. Hans Zimmer

Question: In the 2015 movie 'The Martian', which two songs are included in the exit music, with 'Don't Leave Me This Way' playing first?
Options:
A. I Will Always Love You
B. Don't Leave Me This Way
C. I Will Survive
D. Stayin' Alive
Answer: Don't Leave Me This Way and I Will Survive
